document.full_text: exelon is near a deal to buy constellation energy, a fellow utility company, for about $7.7 billion in stock, people briefed on the matter told dealbook.
document.title: exelon nears takeover of constellation energy
lines_and_colors: exelon is near a deal to buy constellation energy, a fellow utility company, for about $7.7 billion in stock, people briefed on the matter told dealbook.
